thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Sharon Doucet

author: Sharon Doucet
title: Sharon Doucet
text:
This transaction was the first one for me, even though I have flown for many years I have never had to book with any airline except the one my husband worked for. I must be able to get on this particular flight for 2 reasons, one is to attend a funeral our of country and the second is to be the travelling aid for my friend with disabilities so I needed to book for the same flight without knowing I was only on standby and may not make the flight.
I found that it was very easy to use the sight and was able to book my flight in a very quick time. I did run into one issue and that was my fault, I gave the wrong expiration date on my credit card. I had the confirmation of my booking and within 15 minutes I received a call from the people at Flight Network to inform me of this and we had this error corrected within a few minutes and the electronic ticket receipt was waiting within the next hour for me to print off.
Would I recommend this site to others ---YES-- just as it was recommended to me .
Respectfully
Sharon D in Calgary
